title: Bernie Sanders Swears in Zohran Mamdani as NYC Mayor
description: Sen. Bernie Sanders delivered the oath of office to Zohran Mamdani, swearing him in as New York City’s 112th mayor on the steps of City Hall. (Source: Bloomberg)
content: Sen. Bernie Sanders delivered the oath of office to Zohran Mamdani, swearing him in as New York City’s 112th mayor on the steps of City Hall. (Source: Bloomberg)
